attributes.action: To make burning of the Union Jack / our national flag illegal.
attributes.additional_details: We currently have no law in the U.K. regarding burning of the Union Jack / our nation flag and as this is becoming more common the law needs to change.
attributes.background: To make burning of the Union Jack / our nation flag by any parties illegal for which the person/persons would receive a prison sentence.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325545
